text:
A ‘passport mela’ will be organised by the Regional Passport Office, Coimbatore on January 9 at the Passport Seva Kendra (PSK), 25 AGT Business Park, Avinashi road, Coimbatore.

According to a release, applicants from Coimbatore, Salem, Erode, Namakkal, Tirupur and the Nilgris districts who have registered online at www.https://passportindia.gov.in and obtained a valid ARN, can approach the PSK at the appointment time on January 9.

For those who prefer to submit applications at the venue, appointments will be available from January 7 at 1.30 p.m. Applications for the issue of ordinary international passport under normal course will be accepted and only applicants with appointments will be allowed.

Tatkaal, police clearance certificate and walk-in applications will not be accepted on the day.
title: Passport mela
